messages: 8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (06:48): got kde done mozilla done now for sendmail
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:05): wow sun.com makes it look simple
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:06): its like a few cmds and its configured
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:07): i mussve read the fbsd site wrong when trying to do it
ae1abd939ff19ab7aaacb5c852a19409 (07:07): hmm, never been a sendmail fan myself, but I'll have to look at the sun docs
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:07): for basic setup its pretty straightforward
ae1abd939ff19ab7aaacb5c852a19409 (07:08): I've just seen _tons_ of sendmail security issues over the years, turned me toward postfix
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:08): dont bother if you dont use it
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:08): well for a home network, no biggie
ae1abd939ff19ab7aaacb5c852a19409 (07:08): never hurts to read up, may be working for a diehard sendmail fan some day
6cea4699d24c055f10c28fd15bbf9f1b (07:10): the only downfall seems to be that Sol takes ages to install.
6cea4699d24c055f10c28fd15bbf9f1b (07:35): i'm familiar with the general workings of UNIX...
6cea4699d24c055f10c28fd15bbf9f1b (07:35): just the solaris specific stuff is new to me
6cea4699d24c055f10c28fd15bbf9f1b (07:35): i know about Tab completion too :-P
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:35): thats why everyone got kicked off efnet #solaris
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (07:43): spknspell: i'm trying to find out why
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:43): like mount but for soft partitions?
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (07:43): i created it using metainit and I can see it there in metastat
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (07:44): spknspell: I can mount with soft partitions too
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:44): i wan one "jamesd, stole my virginity on efnet"
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (07:44): but with "my" soft partitions, I don't know what's wrong
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:45): you muss here beeps when your nick is mentioned
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (07:45): jamesd: do you use  soft partitions ?
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (07:45): i use zfs no more playing games wiht partitions
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:45): how can you constantly watch the terminal and get shit done?
7ef291c89ad915978b203d427919cfbb (07:46): who says i get any shite done.... i just spent 8 days at saint mary's hospital
30967e36448a9cc4a7b13b48a35ba90a (07:46): I have Sun service contract.  Will they help me with soft partition questions ?
8226c4607a3453a57fe142a46fe43259 (07:47): or you can read the logs at least heh
